title: event
description: Mission Control specific structure for security events.

anyOf.title: observed-data--event
anyOf.description: Observed data conveys information that was observed on systems and networks, such as log data or network traffic, using the Cyber Observable specification.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `observed-data`.

anyOf.title: relationship--based-on
anyOf.description: Relationship that shows an indicator is based on observed-data (ie: is an event).

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `relationship`.

source_ref.description: The ID of the source (from) object.

target_ref.description: The ID of the target (to) object.

relationship_type.title: relationship_type
relationship_type.description: The name used to identify the type of relationship.

anyOf.title: sco--event-observables
anyOf.description: Catch all for any objects that are SCO types.

type.description: Indicates that this object is a custom Observable Object.
